subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Manchester United rallied past visiting Tottenham, 3-1, in the fourth round of the F.A. Cup behind two goals by Cristiano Ronaldo.Carlos Tévez scored the other goal for United, which reached the Round of 16. United joined Chelsea, Arsenal and Liverpool in Monday’s fifth-round draw. Visiting Manchester City lost to the League Championship team Sheffield United, 2-1.
